description:
The café regulars display there not so hidden talents and while Polar Bear is on a New Year’s 
vacation, Penguin doesn’t know what to do without being at the café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doubutsu-tachi no Kakushigei Taikai / Shinnen no Okiaku-san
The Animals` Hidden Talent Competition! / New Year`s Guest
動物達のかくし芸大会 / 新年のお客さん
